description.value: A Book contains fiction or nonfiction. If you consult an accurate nonfiction Book about its topic, you gain a +5 bonus to Intelligence (Arcana|XPHB, History|XPHB, Nature|XPHB, or Religion|XPHB) checks you make about that topic.

_srdData.name: Book
entries: A Book contains fiction or nonfiction. If you consult an accurate nonfiction Book about its topic, you gain a +5 bonus to Intelligence ({@skill Arcana|XPHB}, {@skill History|XPHB}, {@skill Nature|XPHB}, or {@skill Religion|XPHB}) checks you make about that topic.
